titleStmt.title: An impartial account of the arraignment trial & condemnation of Thomas late Earl of Strafford, and Lord Lievtanant of Ireland before the Parliament at Wesminster, Anno Dom, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641, defendant.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
